title: Trade Tier
description: Defines a tier of trades that becomes available as a villager levels up.

tokens.text: experience points and contains trade groups or direct trades

fields.title: Total Experience Required
fields.description: The total experience points required for this tier to unlock. For novice (tier 1), this is typically 0. Higher tiers require more XP (e.g., 10, 70, 150, 250).

fields.title: Trade Groups
fields.description: Array of trade groups available at this tier. Each group can randomly select one or more trades to offer.

fields.title: Trades (Direct)
fields.description: Array of trades directly in this tier, without grouping. Alternative to using groups.
